item.title: Writing + Honors
item.description: Selected Publications “Cara” in Nat. Brut Issue 16, December 2022 “Mine” in The Offing, November 2022 “Loquats” in No Tokens Journal Issue 10, October 2022 “Techno Show” in X-R-A-Y Literary Magazine, August 2021 “Schrödinger’s Cat” in Barren Magazine Issue 19, August 2021 “A Happy Ending” in HAD, July 2021 “bone orchard” in Rejection Letters, July 2021 Honors 2023 Periplus Fellowship Finalist 2021 Pushchart Prize Nomination for “Schrödinger’s Cat” by Barren Magazine Honorable Mention for the 2020 Felicia Farr Lemmon Poetry Prize from the Academy of American Poets

item.title: Experience
item.description: Experience Tin House Summer Workshop under Lesley Nneka Arimah, July 2022 VONA Summer Workshop under Mathangi Subramanian, June 2022 Fiction reader at Okay Donkey Magazine, Jan 2022–Current Assistant poetry editor at Anomaly Journal, Nov 2021–Current Education English B.A., Computer Science B.A. at Brown University, 2013-2017

item.title: &Etc
item.description: Lists Inspiration the moon, the body, body horror, bodies of water, holes, desire, yearning, the strange & supernatural & surrealist, chinese folklore, the politics of revolution & solidarity, becoming & undoing, eggs, pills, computers, computer-generated poetry, simulations Books I Like I’m Waiting For You by Kim Bo-young: a speculative short story collection translated from Korean. Time travel, fallen gods, love that transcends time and place, it has it all! Broken Stars by various authors: an anthology of Chinese Sci-Fi translated into English by the Hugo Award-winning Ken Liu.
